reporting.absenceTypes: H: Holiday, S: Sick, V: Vacation

errors.addReferenceError: An error occurred while adding an object.
errors.removeReferenceError: An error occurred while removing an object.
errors.checkValidityError: An error occurred while checking the validity of the references.

help-tooltip.title: What is happening here?
help-tooltip.question1: What needs to be done in this area?
help-tooltip.answer1: In this area, you enter the contract references of the assistants assigned to you.
help-tooltip.question2: What do these cryptic strings mean?
help-tooltip.answer2: The strings are references to your assistants' contracts in Clock.
help-tooltip.question3: Where do these strings come from?
help-tooltip.answer3: When an assistant creates a contract in Clock, a string is generated. The assistant must send it to you, and you must assign it here.
help-tooltip.question4: What if I'm not sure if a string is valid?
help-tooltip.answer4: If many of these references accumulate over time, you can check if they are still valid with the 'Check Validity' button.
